title: 1913 real photo postcard with a Fatima Ad Piece prominently displayed
author: slidekellyslide

posts.post_title: 1913 real photo postcard with a Fatima Ad Piece prominently displayed
posts.post_content: Real photo postcard is trimmed about 1/4 inch off the bottom...has two creases at the bottom corners.  Very sharp photo which includes a Fatima advertising sign.  $SOLD
